channel.title: Vscode on Embedded Systems Design
channel.description: Recent content in Vscode on Embedded Systems Design

item.title: Using the Pymakr Extension in VSCode
item.description: pymaker install pymakr preview code --install-extension Pycom.pymakr-preview Getting Started with Pymakr (from here) In File explorer(ctrl+shift+e) add or create a project folder for holding your micropython code (suggestion: name it “micropython”).

item.title: VSCode Setup and Usage
item.description: Installation Download from here Installation Options Accept the default installation path keep “Register Code as an editor for supported file types” checked keep “Add to PATH” checked other options: set to your preference Ubuntu-specific cd ~/Downloads sudo dpkg -i code_1.
